attic moisture detected.reason: Signs of moisture in attic. Must address source before insulating.
attic moisture detected.recommendation: Inspect roof, flashing, or ventilation. Document and resolve moisture issue before proceeding.
attic moisture detected.visual_cue: Moisture stains, discoloration, or mold on attic sheathing or insulation

open electrical junction box.reason: Live electrical wiring visible in an open box. Immediate safety hazard.
open electrical junction box.recommendation: Cover with a code-compliant junction box lid or have a licensed electrician correct the wiring.
open electrical junction box.visual_cue: Uncovered box with visible wires or wire nuts

bathroom fan not vented to exterior.reason: Bathroom exhaust fan venting into attic or crawlspace introduces moisture and mold risk.
bathroom fan not vented to exterior.recommendation: Reroute fan duct to terminate outside via gable, roof, or wall cap.
bathroom fan not vented to exterior.visual_cue: Fan duct visible ending in attic or crawl, no exterior termination
